entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make ParameterExtractingExpressionVisitor capable of extracting paths to evaluatable fragments in the tree #32999
  • Add support for [MemberNotNull] for Entity Framework properties #32997
  • Please provide an extension method for EF and Linq2DB to have clear join tables such as Inner Join, Left Join, and Right Join. #32994
  • Exact match search does not work in a nested collection that is mapped as JSONB #32993
  • ValueConverters do not detect changes when using ChangeTrackingProxies / ChangedAndChangingNotifications #32992

Closed

  • Accidentally using field instead of property for JSON metadata produce hard to understand exception #32939
    9.0.0-preview2
  • Please provide an extension method for EF Core and Linq2DB to have clear join tables such as Inner Join, Left Join, and Right Join. #32995
  • How to build CASE statement when using ExecuteUpdate #32990

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix to #32939 - Accidentally using field instead of property for JSON metadata produce hard to understand exception #32966

Updated

  • Cleanup asserts #32968
  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #32721
  • Stop throwing eagerly when looking up a ValueGenerator #32930
  • Add fill factor to keys and unique constraints #32900
  • Fix lock loosing in concurrency detector for multiple contexts on one thread #31891
    blocked, needs-design
  • Translate to NULLIF #32710
    blocked
